New Records: Tarik Skubal has 16 wins this season, the most in baseball.
Tarik Skubal lowered his MLB-best ERA to 2.51 through 168.1 innings.
Tarik Skubal now has 203 strikeouts, which also tops baseball.
Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney hit a two-run double that knocked in Zach McKinstry and Spencer Torkelson.
Tyler O'Neill hit a home run in the top of the first inning against Tarik Skubal.
Pre-Game Insights: Detroit needs to win games against teams ahead of them in the wild card race, like the Boston Red Sox, to make up ground.
Post-Match Reflections: Tarik Skubal's performance against the Red Sox should all but sew up the Cy Young Award for him and cement his spot in the MVP race.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game looms large as the Tigers would be only a half-game behind Boston if they are able to pick up the win.
Others: The pitching Triple Crown has not been accomplished in a 162-game season since Johan Santana did it in 2006.
